instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message:
MacBook from another shop - liquid damage on U3000 area, C9062, C6405 area, Q7680 area, Q7065

Audio board + flex is good.

Chime, trackpad clicks, caps lock light ON, backlight on display but no data.

No video on ext monitor.

Any idea?

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message: I cant I am afraid as when it is turned off it boots itself.

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message: Cannot turn it off pressing power button 5s?

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message: Yes, I can but after second or two it starts itself.

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message:
And stays on?
Check for USB activity.

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message: No, after 2-4 minutes for a short time fan on max rpm, USB activity OFF and reboot with chime.

threads.title: 820-01521 no image
threads.message: Possibly accumulated crap under some BGA chip.
